topics.body:
"@Twisty":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5479040c63687246108e0100#post_5479040c63687246108e0100
[bq="Twisty"]why dont black people just become white if they are so tired of racism?[/bq]
Actually speaking of which there's a growing industry called ethnic plastic surgery centered around just that where individuals undergo plastic surgery to look more like other ethnicities; while it can't change skin color, *yet*, it can make someone say asian look caucasian or someone that's caucasian look asian.

An example:
!http://q8allinone.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/Brazilian-Man-Gets-Plastic-Surgery-To-Look-Asian.jpg!
